1.content:
you awaken to see your in a whirlpool looking place. There is also a strange purple man like thing it has arms but no legs and has claws on its face like a scorpion. Of course the damn thing talks

"Hello there um, human? you've fallen into a vortex into a different dimension Oooo... Now I will help you first thing is first are you a boy or girl?"

You look at it like and state that you are a
1.title: How shall we start

11.content:
You say "I am man!" and bang on your chest looking at the thing

"right... well then, so I have some worlds you can go to, pick one"

You look at him confused and he sits there for a full 30 seconds.

"Oh right well if you stay here your going to die so go pick, pick quick"

You look them over looks like some are tv shows better break them down first.
11.title: boy

12.content:
You say "I am woman!" and bang on your chest looking at the thing, and hurting a little because you punched yourself in the boob.

"right... well then, so I have some worlds you can go to, pick one"

You look at him confused and he sits there for a full 30 seconds.

"Oh right well if you stay here your going to die so go pick, pick quick"

You look them over looks like some are tv shows better break them down first.
12.title: girl

info.brief_description: you get a sent to a strange new world with tons of dateable toons
info.description:
"Well great, looks like a human fell in here again. Well if your here I will give you the rules."


No killing ( dating story)
sex is aloud
Pregnancy and marriage if it gets that far
No changing genders in the middle of a story
